snippet.title: Langrisser I & II - Langrisser II Story Trailer (Nintendo Switch, PS4, Steam) (EU - English)
snippet.description:
Learn more @ https://nisamerica.com/langrisser-1-2/

The legend continues in Langrisser II! 200 years have passed since the great battle between the forces of light and darkness. In a land ravaged by war, nefarious forces seek to unseal the evil sword Alhazard and claim its power. It is up to Elwin, the new Descendant of Light, to find the Sacred Sword Langrisser and defeat those who wield Alhazard!

Coming 13 March 2020 to PlayStation 4, Nintendo Switch, and Steam.
